subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: This train has run out of track!
author: Frank Ratka
full_text:
--0-841448465-1250518619=:59598
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Honestly, I think it is impossible to understand the perspective in which t=
hese "beings" are relaying their information. They may not even be speaking=
 of this reality but of something else. They may not even be completely con=
scious when connecting to you for communication. A lot of you assume this i=
s some type of telephone call were you are dealing with a completely cohera=
nt person on the other end of the line. This is a connection between you an=
d whatever is out there that shares your attitude and emotional disposition=
, the radio, box or whatever has very little to do with it. The stronger yo=
ur psi connection or "bridge" is with the other entity the better or more c=
lear your connection will be.

I don't think I have ever received predictio=
ns of future events. Everything I get has dealt with the present! Sumption =
is right, if you have expectations then you have made a lot of assumptions,=
 which means on some level you think you know what is going on or how this =
communication is coming about and who it is with. If you want this very rea=
l communication to work then you have to approach it with now expectations,=
 assume nothing and have a positive outlook.

Frank R.




________________=
________________
From: ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...>
To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 15, 2009 9:03:12 PM
Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: This train has run out of track!

=A0 

Hard to know why the voices =
seem to play with people. I have had files that validated objects that I wa=
s holding in my hand, so I do believe that it is possible for earthbound sp=
irits to communicate with us, as well as other beings from other realms. Ca=
n never know their intentions though, and it can be discouraging when these=
 entities choose to toy with us or trick us. Guess there is not anything we=
 really can do about it, however I do believe that there is something very =
important going on with box communication, and even though it isn't fully u=
nderstood, can be a very powerful source of communitation. I hope that if a=
 break from building and researching is necessary, then have a good one. It=
 is my hope though that you do not just abandon this line of communication =
no matter how frustrating it can be from time to time.

thanks
Andy

--- In=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:
>
>=
 I have gotten these bogus predicitons over and over, and couple that with
=
> the fact I ask questions, and get lies--that's enough! I can't make this
=
> crap, and I can't provide something to people that I know that 90% of wha=
t
> comes though is lies. You can't prove the afterlife if none of the
> in=
formation coming through any of these methods is reliable. Yes there is
> s=
omething that talks that shouldn't be there, and you can prove it's not
> r=
adio fragments, or anything else earthly--but it still lies! It's not
> inf=
ormation, it's useless garbage. I don't care who you think you are, or
> ho=
w smart you think you are, or how many "right" questions you know. These
> =
entites will lead you around by the nose till you wise up.
> 
> I have seri=
ous doubts about the Queen Mary thing, I think I'd have to side
> with the =
debunkers on this BS. I don't know what talks, but it ain't your
> Auntie E=
dna.
> 
> Went to RS and got enough supplies to finish the present projects=
 and I'm
> not making anymore, nor can I give any away knowing what I know =
about this
> stuff.
> 
> Frank-S
>
